snippet: At nearly every stop in three boroughs, the authorities said, Daniel St. Hubert left evidence that began to be unlocked Wednesday in an eight-hour avalanche of revelations.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; authorities say murder suspect Daniel St Hubert, at nearly every step in three boroughs, left digital and physical evidence that began to be unlocked in eight-hour avalanche of revelations; he has been charged with stabbing two children in Brooklyn, one of whom died, and is suspected of two other murders.
lead_paragraph: At nearly every stop in three boroughs, the authorities said, Daniel St. Hubert left evidence that began to be unlocked Wednesday in an eight-hour avalanche of revelations.

headline.main: Tense Search, Chilling Note and an Arrest in Brooklyn Stabbings
headline.print_headline: Tense Search, Chilling Note and an Arrest
